markdownRemark.html:
Got an allergy?

We have alternatives to milk such as SOY MILK and ALMOND MILK

name: 'pcp',
description: 'plant based creamer that contains small traces of dairy',
allergy: 'lactose intolerant',

description: 'white pearl is kanten jelly made from agar agar which is a seaweed derivative',

category: 'vegan',
